1.2.name: wordpress/5gig-concerts
1.2.description:
What is it? Wordpress Concerts Importer is a plugin for wordpress focused for music blogs.

What’s for? You can use it to search and seek information about gigs/concerts from your wordpress editor. With it you can add the concert’s information in just a few clicks.

What information does it include? You can show either the upcoming concerts of an artist or a venue. Or even the details of the concert itself like the address, price, map and the different ticket vendors.

Demonstration In our blog you can can check many of our posts with the concert information. http://www.5gig.co.uk
